item.description:
Great Boston NLP & Hypnosis Meetup - Lexington

Topic: Meet & Greet

This will be an informal gathering so we can eat and talk with Like Minded People.

We can discuss hypnosis & NLP  can be used in your life and even have a demo if the opportunity arises.  But mostly we will get to know each other.

Since we could not get the library tonight, I wanted to offer a chance for those who are used to9 meeting on this night

 

Come and Have Fun.

 

Kevin Martin, CHT

www.poseffects.com

978-494-4542
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign at the table

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Lexington- Hypnosis Meet & Greet
